content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Aug 2019I have yet to receive my YouTrip card even though I applied a few months back?Even my friend who applied later have already received her card. What should I do?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

CTChristina TanLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 18 Aug 2019I actually emailed YouTrip directly as I experienced the same thing and waited for 6mths prior to that. They apologized saying there was a glitch and will expedite the issuance of my card. I received my card in less than 2 weeks after that email.0 comments1
